content.raw:
I had noticed that and shoved the fix into pull request #528 here: #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/528/component-inspector/diff#chg-src/gui/plugins/entity_tree/EntityTree.qml

The only difference from your fix is that I change to `width: tree.width`. I think that's needed so that the column expands together with the entire plugin.
content.html:
I had noticed that and shoved the fix into pull request #528 here: #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/528/component-inspector/diff#chg-src/gui/plugins/entity_tree/EntityTree.qml

The only difference from your fix is that I change to width: tree.width. I think that's needed so that the column expands together with the entire plugin.
